tag_list: telstra, avg, venture, engineer, environmental, sailor, applications
overview:
For over 20-years, Brett has been an organisational, product, and service evangelist, is a trusted advisor, consumate diplomat, connected networker, and capable strategist in ICT and public interest projects.

Spanning from global non-profits, to the largest of enterprises - across Australasia, the Americas and beyond. From idea, development, launch, operations, and exit - of technology, communications, environmental engineering, health education, and sailing - he is seldom idle.
